annotations.template.openshift.io/long-description: This template defines resources needed to develop a SpringBoot application, including a build configuration, application deployment configuration, and database deployment configuration.

message:

annotations.description: Keeps track of changes in the application image
Defines how to build the application

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

parameters.name: GITLAB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: GitLab trigger secret.  A difficult to guess string encoded as part of the webhook URL.  Not encrypted.
